mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.pub_key as pubKey, t1.pri_key as priKey, t1.kpg_algorithm as keyPairAlgorithm, t1.km_kpg_task as kpgTask, t1.gen_time as genTime, t1.start_time as startTime, t1.end_time as endTime, t1.cert_sn as certSn, t1.cert_dn as certDn, t2.name as name, t2.kpg_algorithm as keyPairAlgorithm, t3.alg_name as algorithmName from keypair_inuse t1,kpg_task t2,keypair_algorithm t3 WHERE t1.kpg_algorithm=t3.alg_name AND t2.kpg_algorithm=t3.id AND t1.km_kpg_task=t2.name
mapper.insert: insert into keypair_inuse( pub_key, pri_key, kpg_algorithm, km_kpg_task, gen_time, start_time, end_time, cert_sn, cert_dn, inuse_time )values( #{pubKey}, #{priKey}, #{keyPairAlgorithm.algorithmName}, #{kpgTask.name}, #{genTime}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{certSn}, #{certDn}, #{inuseTime} )
mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.pub_key as pubKey, t1.pri_key as priKey, t1.kpg_algorithm as keyPairAlgorithm, t1.km_kpg_task as kpgTask, t1.gen_time as genTime, t1.start_time as startTime, t1.end_time as endTime, t1.cert_sn as certSn, t1.cert_dn as certDn, t2.name as name, t2.kpg_algorithm as keyPairAlgorithm, t3.alg_name as algorithmName from keypair_inuse t1,kpg_task t2,keypair_algorithm t3 WHERE t1.kpg_algorithm=t3.alg_name AND t2.kpg_algorithm=t3.id AND t1.km_kpg_task=t2.name and cert_sn=#{certSn}
select count(0) from keypair_inuse where end_time <=#{endTime}

select t1.id, t1.pub_key as pubKey, t1.pri_key as priKey, t1.kpg_algorithm as keyPairAlgorithm, t1.km_kpg_task as kpgTask, t1.gen_time as genTime, t1.start_time as startTime, t1.end_time as endTime, t1.cert_sn as certSn, t1.cert_dn as certDn, t2.name as name, t2.kpg_algorithm as keyPairAlgorithm, t3.alg_name as algorithmName from keypair_inuse t1,kpg_task t2,keypair_algorithm t3 WHERE t1.kpg_algorithm=t3.alg_name AND t2.kpg_algorithm=t3.id AND t1.km_kpg_task=t2.name and end_time <=#{endTime}

select t1.id, t1.pub_key as pubKey, t1.pri_key as priKey, t1.kpg_algorithm as keyPairAlgorithm, t1.km_kpg_task as kpgTask, t1.gen_time as genTime, t1.start_time as startTime, t1.end_time as endTime, t1.cert_sn as certSn, t1.cert_dn as certDn, t2.name as name, t2.kpg_algorithm as keyPairAlgorithm, t3.alg_name as algorithmName from keypair_inuse t1,kpg_task t2,keypair_algorithm t3 WHERE t1.kpg_algorithm=t3.alg_name AND t2.kpg_algorithm=t3.id AND t1.km_kpg_task=t2.name
and certDn LIKE '%${certDn}%'
and certSn LIKE '%${certSn}%'
